post.body: I think you've found my dream wedding venue. ENGAGE!
Happy B-day, EG!
nothing, that's what.
I found my book, but when a single sentence is over 1,000 words long... my brain can't handle that this early in the morn.
In other fine news, all I want 4 Christmas is a top of the line nosehair trimmer. Cuz that piece of crap just ain't cutting it, y'all.
Mama is looking rough this morning. Foul-mouthed and fugly is the name of the game!
F'reals, Bridger. This made my day: http://i2.photobucket.com/albums/y27/bridegur/boring.jpg
What? No Facebook fan page for lunch? Who isn't a fan of lunch?
Feeling pukish. And wondering if I bother driving back 2 my parents house to search for my book. Work will be so slow tomorrow. Need a read!
AHSIOFPUWEOIAJROIWER! WHERE THE FUH IS MY BOOK! I hate it when I misplace things!!! *shakes fist*
feeling a little: http://www.lukechueh.com/paintings/reach.html
So very upset that I have to work today, and won't be spending time with my fam. *whines*
I have this wicked craving to watch Paul T. Anderson movies.
I think I may be coming down with a weird rash. In other news, I'm completely in love with a 2 year old named Lucy.
must. stop. eating.
what's more depressing: that I gained 2 lbs in the last 2 days or the fact I just took 10 min of my life watching Fergie vids on youtube.
Decided to try tackling this behemoth during the Christmas break: http://tinyurl.com/86g5ch
your apocalypse was fab.
Any chance someone has a fog machine? So I can recreate this instant classic? http://tinyurl.com/2hspx6
So surprised The Job Place's internet filter is letting me look at personals on craigslist. So many douchebags = endless entertainment!
